title: Implement Dashboard Overview Widgets
body: Create real-time KPI widgets for open rate, click rate, unsubscribe rate, and delivery trends.

child_issues.title: Design KPI widget UI components
child_issues.body: Design reusable React components for displaying KPI widgets on dashboard.

child_issues.title: Implement real-time data fetching for KPIs
child_issues.body: Set up API endpoints and websocket subscriptions to fetch real-time KPI data.

child_issues.title: Integrate KPI widgets with backend data
child_issues.body: Connect frontend widgets with backend API and ensure real-time updates.

title: Create Analytics Event Tracking
body: Track user engagement metrics like opens, clicks, bounces, and unsubscribes across campaigns.

child_issues.title: Define database schema for event tracking
child_issues.body: Design schema to store events such as email opens, clicks, bounces, unsubscribes.

child_issues.title: Implement event ingestion API
child_issues.body: Create backend endpoints to receive and validate event tracking data.

child_issues.title: Build event processing and aggregation pipeline
child_issues.body: Develop backend processes to aggregate event data for reporting.

title: Design Audience Management Table
body: Implement paginated, filterable table to manage subscribers with tags, segments, and import/export functionality.

child_issues.title: Design table UI with pagination and filtering
child_issues.body: Create responsive UI for subscriber list with pagination, search, and filters.

child_issues.title: Implement backend API for audience data
child_issues.body: Create endpoints to support querying subscribers with filters and pagination.

child_issues.title: Add import/export functionality for audience
child_issues.body: Enable CSV import/export and tagging features for subscriber lists.

title: Build Campaign Creation Wizard
body: Step-by-step campaign builder for selecting audience, editing content, and setting schedule.

child_issues.title: Design campaign creation UI/UX flow
child_issues.body: Design wireframes and UI components for multi-step campaign creation.

child_issues.title: Implement audience selection step
child_issues.body: Allow users to select existing audience segments or create new ones.

child_issues.title: Create email content editor step
child_issues.body: Integrate WYSIWYG editor or HTML editor for email content creation.

child_issues.title: Add scheduling and delivery options step
child_issues.body: Implement UI to schedule send time and configure delivery preferences.

title: Add Campaign Analytics Endpoints
body: Expose endpoints to provide real-time stats for sent campaigns, including click heatmaps.

child_issues.title: Design API schema for campaign statistics
child_issues.body: Define REST API contract for campaign open rates, click rates, and heatmaps.

child_issues.title: Implement backend data aggregation for analytics
child_issues.body: Develop backend logic to calculate stats from raw event data.

child_issues.title: Create API endpoints to serve analytics data
child_issues.body: Implement API endpoints with pagination and filtering options.

title: Implement Billing & Subscription UI
body: Create interface to manage plan, view usage limits, update payment method and invoices.

child_issues.title: Design billing dashboard UI
child_issues.body: Create visual design and layout for billing and subscription management.

child_issues.title: Integrate payment gateway APIs
child_issues.body: Connect to payment providers (Stripe, PayPal) for subscription payments.

child_issues.title: Implement subscription plan selection and limits display
child_issues.body: Allow users to upgrade/downgrade plans and view usage quotas.

title: Develop Team Management Permissions
body: Support roles and invitations for team members to collaborate with access control.

child_issues.title: Design roles and permissions model
child_issues.body: Define user roles, permissions matrix and inheritance rules.

child_issues.title: Implement invitations and user onboarding
child_issues.body: Build API and UI for inviting team members and accepting invites.

child_issues.title: Enforce access control across platform
child_issues.body: Apply permissions checks on frontend routes and backend APIs.

title: Integrate Custom Domain Setup
body: Allow users to connect their own domains for email delivery and white labeling.

child_issues.title: Implement domain verification flow
child_issues.body: Allow users to verify ownership of custom domains via DNS records.

child_issues.title: Configure sending infrastructure for custom domains
child_issues.body: Set up SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records for email deliverability.

child_issues.title: Create UI for managing connected domains
child_issues.body: Allow users to add, remove, and view status of custom domains.
